name: Kunky Remastered: Back at the Slaughter House
name_original: Kunky Remastered: Back at the Slaughter House
description:
Kunky is back, now he will be not stuck on the doors anymore, Yay! About:

Kunky is a parody/fan game ( I love to that prase lol ) of Dave Microwave Games, check his games, they're really cool!

This is a remastered version of the original Kunky from 2019. Point and I decided to remaster this game on 2021, but we got lazy and just now we decided to work on this again. Now it's actually playable and Kunky doesn't get stuck. And also, one day on a discord server, we've decided that Point's Kunky was gonna be Normal's Kunky son. So then we created Skunky. So now you have to deal with 2 Unky's isn't that cool?

Story:

Long story short, you've got kidnapped my an unky. And that unky happens to be Kunky, and now he's with Skunky! Can you escape from them?

Character info:

Kunky: It's Kunky, from the Unky's He's purple... The man behind the slaughter.

Lil' Kunky AKA Point's Kunky, the one that's sleeping.

Skunky: The lime green one, she's Kunky's wife.

Some words from A normal Mate:

I was really surprised when we finished this game, I was really not expecting to see Kunky ever again, I'm just really happy with the result!

Some words from Point Pogger:

"I Eat Pears"

"Chicken Sandwich"

*Random ass Noises in the Background that Normal pointed out*
